quote: But undying memories stood like sentinels in her breast. When the notes of doves, calling to each other, fell on her ear, her eyes sought the sky, and she heard a voice saying, ""Majella!
quote_letters: BUT UNDYING MEMORIES STOOD LIKE SENTINELS IN HER BREAST WHEN THE NOTES OF DOVES CALLING TO EACH OTHER FELL ON HER EAR HER EYES SOUGHT THE SKY AND SHE HEARD A VOICE SAYING MAJELLA

chat:
heavier: More weighty than usual.
eldest: First born or most senior.
logged: Recorded systematically, typically with a date or time.
echoes: Repeating sound caused by reflection of sound waves.
Norman: Native or resident of North West France.
Henrik: Scandinavian male name.
uninhabited: Not lived in by people.
neither: Not one nor the other of two things.
themes: Topics or subjects that are recurrent or repeated.
Josiah: Hebrew male name.
assets: Property or resources owned by someone or something.
clutch: Firm grasp of something.
Kingsley: English male name.
shower: Brief fall of rain, snow or hailstones.
obsolete: No longer used or produced, out of date.
nightly: Done or happening every night.
royale: High quality, particularly in the context of food or hotels.
avatar: Symbolic representation of a person in a virtual world.
months: A unit of time, typically 28, 30, or 31 days.
one-off: Something that happens or is made only once.
needles: Sharp-pointed instrument used for sewing or piercing.
Audrey: English female name.
